testcase.name: : Verify that as a user,they can view our products,
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed When User enters aspiration.com.............................................passed And Hits enter..............................................................passed Then User have to see Aspiration home_page..................................passed Given User had navigated to Home_page.......................................passed When User clicked Spend&Save link at the top of the home page...............passed Then User can see two card products, Aspiration and Aspiration_Plus.........passed Given User on Spend&Save page...............................................passed When User clicked GetAspiration button......................................passed Then A modal input field for an emailaddress are displayed..................passed And A modal sign_up button are displayed...................................passed Given User on Spend&Save page...............................................passed When User clicked GetAspirationPlus button..................................passed Then A modal with monthly and yearly plans are displayed....................passed And Yearly radio option the is "$71.88 paid once yearly" and visible........passed And Monthly radio option is "$7.99 paid monthly" and visible................passed
